function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air changes in 'surge' wards and intensive care units (ICU).","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and other contagious diseases within healthcare settings.","Mitigation":"Implement engineering solutions to improve ventilation and air sterilization, such as portable air filtration systems with UV light sterilization.","Technologies":"Portable air filtration systems, UV light sterilization.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management."},{"Description":"Limited data on the effectiveness of engineering solutions for improving ventilation and air sterilization.","Impact":"Uncertainty regarding the effectiveness of ventilation improvement measures in reducing the risk of airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and other contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Conduct further research and testing to gather data on the effectiveness of ventilation improvement technologies.","Technologies":"Research studies, data collection, testing.","People":"Research institutions, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Scientific and medical research organizations."},{"Description":"Low awareness of the importance of ventilation and air sterilization in reducing the spread of SARS-CoV-2 and other contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of ignorance and neglect of ventilation improvement measures in healthcare settings, leading to higher transmission rates of airborne diseases.","Mitigation":"Educate healthcare workers and facility managers about the importance of ventilation and air sterilization in preventing airborne transmission of contagious diseases.","Technologies":"Training programs, educational materials, awareness campaigns.","People":"Healthcare workers, facility managers.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments."}]}
